data.message: What's the issue with councils saying the labels and lids can't be recycled and if put in recycling with these intact the whole bottle is sent to landfill?

replies.message: Hi Andrew, 100% of our packaging is 100% recyclable. We’ve spent many years ensuring all of our drinks packaging is fully recyclable, from our lids to the type of glue we use to stick on the labels and the colour of PET plastic. We understand that local authorities do give slightly different advice about what to recycle and how but there’s no problem with keeping the cap on as it can be easily separated and recycled into new products. For further advice, please check out: http://spr.ly/61888xHLE

Our council say they use a recycling company using men to try sort out the recycling on conveyor belts. It takes too much time to unscrew lids apparently.
